newest.message:
## Features - Upgrade to .net framework 4.8. 4.2.1 will go EOL on 2022-04-26. - Improved HttpRequest logging, thanks @wvdvegt! - Display number of skills remaining, thanks @luyi1888!
## Bug Fixes - Fixed unicode character encoding for ship names, thanks @luyi1888! - Use pool.ntp.org instead of 0.pool.ntp.org, thanks @wvdvegt! - Disable hammertime, thanks @wvdvegt!Type your message here.

release.message:
# Features - Add support for attribute boosters on the overview and character sheet!
# Bug Fixes - Typo fix in PI warning: singular/plural (thanks @NevarrTivianne)
